label.title: Headline - text
label.elementHeight: Set the height of the entire element

helpText.elementType:
Select the type of CTA banner here.

Depending on which type you choose, other configurations will be available to you.
helpText.category:
This is the category that will be output in the storefront.

If you have added a general description to the category, it will be displayed as well.
helpText.mediaActive:
With this setting you can upload background images and videos. For the category banner, the assigned category image is used by default.

Alternatively, you can upload a custom background image with this option.
helpText.backgroundFixed:
When this setting is active, the background is fixed.

The effect is visible when scrolling.
helpText.videoActive:
You can also use a background video for the call-to-action banner.

Upload the video in the media - tab.
helpText.title: This is the headline for the banner. This text is displayed very prominently.
helpText.quote: This is the subtitle of the banner. This text is displayed more discreetly.
helpText.btnActive: If this setting is active, you can add a link using a button.
helpText.btnText: Enter the text that you want to appear on the button.
helpText.btnUrl:
Enter here a reference url to which the button should link.

Example External:
'https://www.example.com'

Example Internal
'/category/product'
helpText.newTab: If this option is active, the link will be opened in a new tab.
helpText.iconActive: Here you can activate the icon for the banner.
helpText.iconClass:
Use an icon class of: Font Awesome
Example:
'fas fa-check'
helpText.elementHeight: Here you can set the height of the banner (in 'px')
helpText.boxHeight: The Caption - Box is the inner content area of the box. with this field you determine the height of the box (in 'px').
helpText.elementBackground:
The Caption Box is the content area of the banner. You can give this area its own background color to make the text on it more readable.

This is useful if you are using a background image.

Tip:
Use partial transparency to let the background image shine through a little.
helpText.boxHeadlineColor: Here you define the color of the caption for the Caption Box. Make sure that the contrast is good.
helpText.boxColor: Here you define the text color of the caption box. Make sure that the contrast is good.
helpText.contentLength:
The category is displayed (if assigned) with description.

Use this field to limit the maximum character length of the description.
helpText.categoryDescritpionActive: If enabled, the description assigned in the categories will be displayed as teaser text.
helpText.videoDisplayMode: Here you specify the display mode of the video in the storefront.
helpText.videoAutoplay: If this setting is active, the video will be played directly as soon as the page is loaded.
helpText.videoMute: This setting disables the sound of the video (if any).
helpText.videoLoop: Play the video in continuous loop with this option.
helpText.verticalAlign: This value determines the vertical alignment of the caption box.
helpText.horizontalAlign: This value determines the horizontal alignment of the caption box.
helpText.textAlign: Here you can determine the alignment of the text within the caption box.
helpText.captionMaxWidth:
This value determines the maximum width of the caption box. The content will never exceed this width.

Tip:
Percentage values, such as '50%' refer to the width of the caption box.
helpText.headlineSize: Here you can choose the font size of the headline.
helpText.textSize: Here you can choose the font size of the teaser text.
helpText.btnType: Here you can influence the color scheme of the button. Use the predefined template variables.
helpText.btnSize: Define the size of the displayed button here.
helpText.btnBlock:
The button is displayed on full width.

Hint:
The button is only as wide as the maximum width of the caption box.
helpText.btnOutline:
The button will be displayed with a border and a transparent background.

Hint:
This function works only if you use one of the predefined colors.
